info.overview: Artworks and illustrations were my gateway to the creative industry which led to the foundation of my own studio and to first steps in the digital world.
info.inspiration: Starting with basic websites several years ago I found myself working as an Art Director for complex projects with a holistic approach soon. Visually appealing designs, subtle details and brand guidelines combined to innovative interfaces across various touch points became my daily companion.
info.lessons: Communicating the conceptual approach/UX strategy and reasoning behind it, is present during the whole process.
